text: Michel Vergnier (born 25 November 1946 in Ennery, Moselle) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Creuse department's only constituency until 2017, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:People from Moselle (department) Category:People from Creuse Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:Unified Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 11th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Michel Vergnier
